text: Hi everyone, I am attempting to completely redo the blog page on a website using HubSpot cms and I am wondering how to replace the existing blog layout. I would like to create a separate template from the existing one and then make the new one active when I am finished working on it. Can anyone tell me if this is possible or how I can go about switching the active template/creating a new separate template?
Yep that is the way that I do it. You can select the template you would like to use in the blog settings template dropdown once you are finished with your new blog template.
Thanks Amy, I believe I have found the correct setting to swap these.
It looks like the existing blog layout is pulling CSS from the base website this blog is attached to - I can't seem to find where this interaction is happening though, any advice?
